code: import React from'react';var Timer=function Timer(props){var minutes=Math.floor(props.timeleft/60);var seconds=props.timeleft%60;var minutesDigits=minutes>=10?String(minutes):'0'+String(minutes);var secondsDigits=seconds>=10?String(seconds):'0'+String(seconds);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{fontWeight:'bold',display:'inline-flex'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{style:{color:'red'}},minutesDigits),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{style:{color:'red'}}," :",secondsDigits));};export default Timer;
